data.title: LinkedIn
data.meta_description:
GALAXIS | 489 followers on LinkedIn. Revolutionizing and democratizing Web3 publishing by allowing purpose-driven creators, brands and communities to thrive. | Galaxis’ technology simplifies the transition from physical to digital economies by providing critical infrastructure that enables anyone to easily deploy web3 communities and marketplaces. We created the Digital Toolkit.

The Digital Toolkit is a no-code, out-of-the-box, architecture for creating decentralized communities.
data.text:
🚀 Dive into the future of blockchain at TAISU Portfolio Webinar! Join us and top Web3 founders for insights on the latest trends in 2024. 📅 Date: May 15th (Wed) ⏰ Time: 9am SG, May 15 (Wed) / 6pm PT, May 14 (Tue) / 9pm ET, May 14 (Tue) 📍 Location: Online, Zoom Webinar ⏳ Duration: 60 mins Featuring talks from: - Takashi Hayashida (https://lnkd.in/eQi5xhdC), Managing Partner at Taisu Ventures - Stark Z., CEO of HypeX - Philip Forte, CEO of Elixir Network - Diego Vidaurre Schaffer, CEO of Beacon - Andras Kristof, CEO of GALAXIS - Luis Huertas, CEO of Littio Join us for an enlightening discussion on growth catalysts and emerging trends in the blockchain space. Gain exclusive insights into disruptive technologies, decentralized finance, and the future of digital assets. 🌐 Don't miss out—secure your spot now! 📣 RSVP here: https://lu.ma/unidzsig Read more here: https://lnkd.in/dPy4Ayef #Blockchain #Web3 #TaisuVentures

🌌 Guided by the best and backed by visionaries. 😍 We are thrilled and thankful now that we are gearing up for our token launch. We are grateful for the support of those who believed in us from the beginning, those who joined us on the go, and those who can see the value of the technology we build. ✨ Galaxis represents a revolutionary platform that has the power to transform the current digital ecosystem. 🤗 Our mission is to empower communities to remain independent and focused on long-term sustainability while providing meaningful engagement and rewards to members. 👾 Imagine a world where communities are free from the risk of being de-platformed, where they can thrive and grow. 📍 Galaxis doesn't replace your existing channels and tools; it enhances them by bridging platforms. 👥 Join us in this amazing journey! Together, we can create a sustainable and independent ecosystem that will last.
